post.body: I vote yes on anti social.

they are verifying that it is you and then match up the rest of the personal info they collected to actually use the card.
"We have not disclosed that to the public. We're declining to."
J.P. Morgan Chase, which got $25 billion in emergency bailout money, has not given any accounting of exactly how the money is being used.
BTW, the link I just posted is a story about "Banks say they can't track where the bailout billions are going, don't care to discuss it"
Ask any small biz if they can get a line of credit now. Even if you could, you better be able to tell them where every penny is going.

livid i want to start a letter writing campaign to Congress and Senate. It is none of our business how banks spend the bailout money & cont

OMG! Now I know where the expression, "You could catch your death of a cold" came from back in the day. I can't hardly function.
